mapper.select: select s.store_seq, store_name, store_add_detail2, add_detail2, store_bsns_hours, store_logo, order_date, order_seq, acc_seq, menu_list,order_price, pay_price, order_Status, order_rider_req, order_store_req from store s, orders o where s.store_seq = o.store_seq and acc_seq=#{acc_seq}
